# buttonAppearance

**Instance Property**

The appearance attributes for plain bar button items in the toolbar.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying @MainActor var buttonAppearance: UIBarButtonItemAppearance { get set }
```

## Discussion

To configure the appearance of a done button item, use the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIToolbarAppearance/doneButtonAppearance] property instead.

## Configuring bar button items

- **prominentButtonAppearance**: The appearance attributes for Prominent buttons.
